verbs.description: < p > [ARG0: The United States] [ARGM-MNR: officially] [V: opened] [ARG1: its embassy] [ARG3: to Israel] [ARGM-LOC: in Jerusalem] [ARGM-TMP: on Monday] , [ARGM-ADV: fulfilling a pledge by President Donald Trump who has recognized the holy city as the Israeli] capital.</p >

< p > [ARG0: The United States] officially opened its embassy to Israel in Jerusalem on Monday , [V: fulfilling] [ARG1: a pledge by President Donald Trump who has recognized the holy city as the Israeli] capital.</p >

< p > The United States officially opened its embassy to Israel in Jerusalem on Monday , fulfilling a pledge by President Donald Trump who [V: has] recognized the holy city as the Israeli capital.</p >

< p > The United States officially opened its embassy to Israel in Jerusalem on Monday , fulfilling a pledge by [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [R-ARG0: who] has [V: recognized] [ARG1: the holy city] [ARG2: as the Israeli] capital.</p >
